translated: Praise of the Lord of the Ganas🔽In Sanskrit: Ārya-gaṇapati-stotra

original: de / @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya ga na pa ti stu ste/_bod skad du/🔽'phags pa tshhogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
analyzed: de / @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya ga na pa ti stu ste/_bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshhogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
translated: In Tibetan: 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa🔽Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'jig rten mgon mdzad snang ba mdzad/
analyzed: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/'jig rten mgon mdzad snang ba mdzad/
translated: You who are the protector of the world, the illuminator,🔽The glorious one, the benefactor,

original: dpal mdzad de bzhin phan pa mdzad/_/mnyam pa med cing dpe med pa/_/
analyzed: dpal mdzad de bzhin phan pa mdzad/_/mnyam pa med cing dpe med pa/_/

analyzed: tshhogs bdag de la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/gsang sngags dbang phyug rig sngags
translated: I pay homage and offer praise to you, Gaṇapati!🔽You are the lord of secret mantra, the king of awareness mantras,🔽The source of all enjoyment, the supreme treasure,

original: rgyal/_/longs spyod 'byung gnas gter gyi mchog_/'bras bu mngon rtogs
analyzed: rgyal/_/longs spyod 'byung gnas gter gyi mchog_/'bras bu mngon rtogs
translated: The teacher who reveals the realization of the result—🔽I pay homage and offer praise to you, Gaṇapati!

original: ston pa yi/_/tshhogs bdag de la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/dpa' bo chen po bdud
analyzed: ston pa yi/_/tshhogs bdag de la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/dpa' bo chen po bdud
translated: The great hero who is victorious over the māras,🔽The one with great strength who conquers the afflictions,

original: las rgyal/_/stobs chen nyon mongs g.yul 'joms pa'i/_/bgegs 'joms
analyzed: las rgyal/_/stobs chen nyon mongs g.yul 'joms pa'i/_/bgegs 'joms

original: sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa/_/glang chen sna ldan gtsho la 'dud/_/rin chen rgyal
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa/_/glang chen sna ldan gtsho la 'dud/_/rin chen rgyal
translated: And pacifies suffering—I bow to you, Gaṇapati, who possesses an elephant’s trunk!🔽The one who is adorned with precious jewels,

original: po rin chen skus/_/rin chen rin chen chen po 'byung /_/rin chen bstan pa
analyzed: po rin chen skus/_/rin chen rin chen chen po 'byung /_/rin chen bstan pa
translated: the protector of the teachings of the precious one,🔽I bow to you, the one with the trunk of an elephant,

original: bsrung mdzad pa/_/glang chen sna ldan khyod la 'dud/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po rdzu🔽'phags pa tshhogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa/
analyzed: bsrung mdzad pa/_/glang chen sna ldan khyod la 'dud/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po rdzu 'phags pa tshhogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa/
translated: the lord of the gaṇas, the one with great magical power,🔽the one who gives relief to the white army of gods

original: 'phrul che/_/lha dmag dkar po dbugs 'byin zhing /_/lha min nag po'i
analyzed: 'phrul che/_/lha dmag dkar po dbugs 'byin zhing /_/lha min nag po'i
translated: and turns back the black army of asuras,🔽I bow to you, the one with the trunk of an elephant.

original: g.yul zlog pa/_/glang chen sna ldan gtsho la 'dud/_/sku ni yon tan rin chen
analyzed: g.yul zlog pa/_/glang chen sna ldan gtsho la 'dud/_/sku ni yon tan rin chen
translated: Your body is the precious jewel,🔽your speech is the essence of qualities,

original: ste/_/gsung ni yon tan ngo bo nyid/_/thugs ni yon tan bdag nyid can/_/
analyzed: ste/_/gsung ni yon tan ngo bo nyid/_/thugs ni yon tan bdag nyid can/_/
translated: your mind is endowed with the nature of qualities,🔽I bow to you, the one with the trunk of an elephant.

original: glang chen sna ldan gtsho la 'dud/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po'i bstod pa slob dpon
analyzed: glang chen sna ldan gtsho la 'dud/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po'i bstod pa slob dpon
